com.BombingGames.WurfelEngine.Core.Map

Class Point

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.BombingGames.WurfelEngine.Core.Map.AbstractPosition
      • com.BombingGames.WurfelEngine.Core.Map.Point
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Point
extends AbstractPosition
    A point is a single position in the game world not bound to the grid. Use this for entities.
    Since:
    WE1.1
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • Point

        public Point(AbstractMap map,
             float posX,
             float posY,
             float height)
        Creates a point refering to a position in the game world.
        Parameters:
        map -
        posX - The distance from the left border of the map (game space)
        posY - The distance from the top border of the map (game space)
        height - The distance from ground (game space)

      • getViewSpcX

        public int getViewSpcX(GameView view)
        Description copied from class: AbstractPosition
        Calculate position in view space.
        Specified by:
        getViewSpcX in class AbstractPosition
        Returns:
        Returns the center of the projected (screen) x-position where the object is rendered without regarding the camera. It also adds the cell offset.

      • getViewSpcY

        Calculate position in view space.
        Specified by:
        getViewSpcY in class AbstractPosition
        Returns:
        Returns the center of the projected (view space) y-position where the object is rendered without regarding the camera.

      • isInMemoryAreaHorizontal

        public boolean isInMemoryAreaHorizontal()
        Description copied from class: AbstractPosition
        Checks if the position is on the chunks currently in memory. Horizontal checks only. So the position can be udner or over the map.
        Specified by:
        isInMemoryAreaHorizontal in class AbstractPosition
        Returns:

      • isInMemoryArea

        public boolean isInMemoryArea()
        Description copied from class: AbstractPosition
        Checks if the position is on the chunks currently in memory. Checks all axis'.
        Specified by:
        isInMemoryArea in class AbstractPosition
        Returns:
        true if inside a chunk. false if currently not loaded.

      • raycast

        public Intersection raycast(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector3 direction,
                            float radius,
                            Camera camera,
                            boolean onlySolid)
        Trace a ray through the map until ray hits non air block.
        Parameters:
        direction - direction of the ray
        radius - the distane after which it should stop.
        camera - if set only intersect with blocks which are rendered (not clipped). ignoring clipping if null
        onlySolid - only intersect if true with block which are not transparent =solid
        Returns:
        can return null if not hitting anything. The normal on the back sides may be wrong. The normals are in a turned coordiante system.
        Since:
        1.2.29
